channel.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
channel.description:
1. How do I make Ancient Smoke Spells Work + Poison? 2. How do I edit how much Dmg spells do? 3. How do I make Ice Barrage Multi Target? 4. How do I add specials (Include how to add the bar)? 5. How do I make it auto-unequip certain items when in the wilderness? [s]6. What file do you edit the emote tabs in?[/s] 7. How do I make the Trade Screen work!? It always changes items you offer into Varrock Armour! DL the source and have a look! 8. How do you stop SYI Pker bots, Nulls and having symbols in the username!? (I think I've got a Null Blocker :) 9. Changing PK timer, making it so attacks only hit every 3 seconds. With mine, hits come right wen you click :\ [s]10. Get rid of chat filter[/s]
Thanks :)
PS: This server is FunScap3 Based. PSS: When all this is completed, I really need a server host :\

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

I dont want the Ice Cube bigger, I just want it to be multi targeted (So it hits more than one person at once).

Read full topic

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

for making barrage hit bigger you need to change the attackNPCSWithin(391, 67, 0); they should have a attackPlayers but cant find it in your code O.o

Read full topic

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

K.

I was adding specs and got this error:

GraphicsHandler.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : method specspell(int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) location: class client person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offse tY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackInd ex);} ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Heres my Graphics Handler Code:

[code]public class GraphicsHandler
{
public static int[] GFXspot = new int[5001];
public static int[] castID = new int[5001];
public static int[] moveID = new int[5001];
public static int[] endID = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxX = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxY = new int[5001];
public static int[] offX = new int[5001];
public static int[] offY = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxA = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxS = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxSH = new int[5001];
public static int[] gfxFH = new int[5001];
public static int[] targetX = new int[5001];
public static int[] targetY = new int[5001];
public static int[] lockOn = new int[5001]; //5001

public GraphicsHandler() {
for (int i = 0; i <= 150; i++) {
GFXspot[i] = 0;
castID[i] = 0;
moveID[i] = 0;
endID[i] = 0;
gfxX[i] = 0;
gfxY[i] = 0;
offX[i] = 0;
offY[i] = 0;
gfxA[i] = 0;
gfxS[i] = 0;
gfxSH[i] = 0;
gfxFH[i] = 0;
targetX[i] = 0;
targetY[i] = 0;
lockOn[i] = 0; //-1
}
}
public static void createSpec(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
//if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60)
person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);}
}
}

public static void addSpell(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (int i = 0; i <= 150; i++) {
if(GFXspot[i] == 0) {
GFXspot[i] = castId;
castID[i] = castId;
moveID[i] = movegfxID;
endID[i] = finishID;
gfxX[i] = casterX;
gfxY[i] = casterY;
offX[i] = offsetX;
offY[i] = offsetY;
gfxA[i] = angle;
gfxS[i] = speed;
gfxSH[i] = startHeight;
gfxFH[i] = endHeight;
targetX[i] = enemyX;
targetY[i] = enemyY;
lockOn[i] = MageAttackIndex;
if (GFXspot[i] != -1)
createSpell(castID[i], gfxY[i], gfxX[i], offY[i], offX[i], gfxA[i], gfxS[i], moveID[i], gfxSH[i], gfxFH[i], endID[i], targetY[i], targetX[i], lockOn[i]);
}
}
}

public static void createSpell(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
//if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60)
person.firespell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movegfxID, startHeight, endHeight, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);}
}
}

public static void removeGFX(int castId, int enemyX, int enemyY) {
for (int i = 0; i <= 150; i++) {
if(GFXspot[i] == castId && targetX[i] == enemyX && targetY[i] == enemyY) {
GFXspot[i] = 0;
castID[i] = 0;
moveID[i] = 0;
endID[i] = 0;
gfxX[i] = 0;
gfxY[i] = 0;
offX[i] = 0;
offY[i] = 0;
gfxA[i] = 0;
gfxS[i] = 0;
gfxSH[i] = 0;
gfxFH[i] = 0;
targetX[i] = 0;
targetY[i] = 0;
lockOn[i] = 0; //-1
}
}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Search for your Iban blast SpellID (Which as Krixus pointed out, should be 1539) and find

hitDiff =

And change that last number to the max hit you want.

Read full topic

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

KK. And heres the code for my ancient spells:

[code]*/
if(magicID == 12975) // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -95 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(391, 67, 0);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(17);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 10;
sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 95)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 96 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12881) // ice explosion (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -69 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(24);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle();
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage(“Got freezed Ch33b!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
stillgfx(363, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 69)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -93 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true))
{
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12929 && playerLevel[3] >= 5) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -114 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 3)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 3)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 3)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 3)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0);
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(37);
NewHP += hitDiff / 2;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
updateRequired = true;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage(“Your life has been drained!”);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours.”);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 114)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 115 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(magicID == 13023) // shadow barrage (lvl 88 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -104 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 5)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 5)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(383, 35, 0);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
PkingDelay = 25;
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 104)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 105 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -89 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 3)==true))
{
startAnimation(1978);
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(37);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].entangle();
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
stillgfx(367, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage(“You are frozen!”);
PkingDelay = 15;
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 89 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 90 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12911) // blood blitz (lvl 80 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -81)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 100)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 150)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 100)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 150)==true))
{
startAnimation(1978);
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
updateRequired = true;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours”);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage(“Your life is drained!”);
PkingDelay = 25;
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 2);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 3);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 81 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
//end of ancients, now for modern magic - xerozcheez[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 05:23:11 PM[/size][hr]This is my Iban’s Blast code.

Look at the 135’s. Will that make it do 135 DMG?

if(spellID == 1539 && (playerRights == 3)) { if(Inair == false) { actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(2927); sendMessage("You rise to the air."); playerSE = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; actionTimer = 0; Inair = true; } if(Inair == true && actionTimer <= 0) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(3157); sendMessage("You blast "+castOnPlayer.playerName+"!"); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You get blasted!"); castOnPlayer.hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //castOnPlayer.setAnimation(837); //Narb: Enable if you want player to completely freeze until they logout\\ stillgfx(453, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); stillgfx(451, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.entangle(); playerSE = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; //if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 135) { hitDiff = 135; } //castOnPlayer.hitDiff = hitDiff; castOnPlayer.KillerId = playerId; castOnPlayer.updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 05:47:28 PM[/size][hr]Are there any other codes that you need?

Read full topic

For #2 you change the Hitdiff.

item.title: -=|| A few simple requests ||=-
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

  1. How do I make Ancient Smoke Spells Work + Poison?
  2. How do I edit how much Dmg spells do?
  3. How do I make Ice Barrage Multi Target?
  4. How do I add specials (Include how to add the bar)?
  5. How do I make it auto-unequip certain items when in the wilderness?
    6. What file do you edit the emote tabs in?
  6. How do I make the Trade Screen work!? It always changes items you offer into Varrock Armour! DL the source and have a look!
  7. How do you stop SYI Pker bots, Nulls and having symbols in the username!? (I think I’ve got a Null Blocker
  8. Changing PK timer, making it so attacks only hit every 3 seconds. With mine, hits come right wen you click :
    10. Get rid of chat filter

Thanks

PS: This server is FunScap3 Based.
PSS: When all this is completed, I really need a server host :\

Read full topic
